page.title: 11EDUCATION, PRIMARY.COVENTRY.
page.content: PRIMARY SCHOOLS EASTERN GREEN. { St Andrews C/E}School,Church Lane, Eastern Green,was built in 1875 & has provided education since that date.The original building is still in daily use.Additional rooms have been built. The school has 160 children 4 to 7 yrs.old,7 teachers 1 Headteacher,they are in 5 classes. At 7 yrs. children transfer to {E.G.Jnr.Sch.}Sutton Ave. E.G.J.Sch. was opened in 1958 to teach the children from the new houses which were were being built.In June 1985 it has 216 children in 7 classes, one headteacher,6 fulltime & 4 part time teachers.Unlike many Coventry schools both inf.& jnr.wear a uniform,grey & blue for the infants & grey with blue ties for jnrs.The jnr sch.has a small swimming pool,outdoors & heated.
